and.name: Header
and.description: there should be a header in which basic operations like "close the application" are displayed

alt.name: FancyColor
alt.description: there should be the possibilty to set the header color

feature.name: Rainbow
feature.description: the header is displayed in rainbow colors #againstHomophobia

feature.name: Green
feature.description: the header is displayed in green

feature.name: CloseButton
feature.description: it should be possible to close the current file

feature.name: Minimize
feature.description: it should be possible to minimize the application

feature.name: Name
feature.description: each file should have a name

alt.name: Time
alt.description: in the header there should be the possibilty to display the current time

feature.name: AnalogClock
feature.description: there shall be a fancy analog clock

feature.name: DigitalClock
feature.description: there shall be a fancy digital clock

and.name: Calendar
and.description: in the toolbar there should be button that opens a calendar

and.name: AddAppointment
and.description: the user should be able to create new appointments in the calendar

feature.name: Date
feature.description: for the appointments it should be possible to set a topic like "date"

feature.name: Deadline
feature.description: for the appointments it should be possible to set a topic like "deadline"

feature.name: Birthday
feature.description: for the appointments it should be possible to set a topic like "birthday"

feature.name: DeleteAppointment
feature.description: the user should be able to delete appointments in the calendar

feature.name: Reminder
feature.description: the user should be able set a reminder for each appointment

feature.name: TextArea
feature.description: the basic surface should be a text area where the user can insert text to save a file later on

and.name: ToolBar
and.description: in the toolbar all possible operations should be displayed by buttons that the user can perform

and.name: File
and.description: the text you enter in the text area should be able to be saved to files. Furthermore, other text files should be able to be displayed and loaded.

feature.name: NewFile
feature.description: the user should be able to create a new file

feature.name: SaveFile
feature.description: the user should be able to save the current file

feature.name: OpenFile
feature.description: the user should be able to open existing files

feature.name: Search
feature.description: it should be possible to search for keywords in the text in the text area

or.name: Font
or.description: for the text in the text area it should be possible to change font settings

feature.name: FontSize
feature.description: one should be able to change the font size

feature.name: Type
feature.description: one should be able to change the font type

feature.name: Bold
feature.description: one should be able to change the set the font bold

feature.name: Highlight
feature.description: one should be able to change highlight the text

feature.name: ClearTextArea
feature.description: the user should be able to clear the whole text area

feature.name: Sticker
feature.description: the user should be able to add some fancy stickers

feature.name: Emojis
feature.description: the user should be able to add some fance emojis

feature.name: Calculator
feature.description: a minimalistic calculator should be opened by clicking on a button in the toolbar

and.name: TODOList
and.description: there should be a button that opens an extra window that can display todos.

feature.name: AddItem
feature.description: a new item should be added if the user wants to

feature.name: DeleteItem
feature.description: an item should be deleted if the user wants to

feature.name: Checkbox
feature.description: when a todo is done the user should be able to check it off in the form of a checkbox with a check mark

feature.name: Galery
feature.description: optionally there should be a button that opens a gallery of images
